code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const TaskList=_ref=>{let{tasks,toggleTask}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Tasks"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"tasks",children:tasks.map(task=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`task-item ${task.priority}`,draggable:true,onDragStart:e=>e.dataTransfer.setData("taskId",task.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:task.isCompleted,onChange:()=>toggleTask(task.id)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:task.isCompleted?'completed':'',children:[task.title," - ",task.date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"priority",children:task.priority})]},task.id))})]});};export default TaskList;
